tourmaster_general.admin-registration-complete-mail: Dear Admin, New customer has created an account Customer’s name : {customer-name} Customer’s email : {customer-email} Customer’s contact number : {customer-phone}
tourmaster_general.admin-booking-made-mail-title: A new booking has been made. Please approve the booking so customer can pay.
tourmaster_general.admin-booking-made-mail: Dear Admin, A new booking form {customer-name} has been made. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {spaces} You can view the transaction here Please note that this customer can't process the payment untill you approvde thier booking.
tourmaster_general.admin-booking-made-approval-mail-title: A new booking has been made. Please approve the booking so customer can pay.
tourmaster_general.admin-booking-made-approval-mail: Dear Admin, A new booking form {customer-name} has been made. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {spaces} You can view the transaction here Please note that this customer can't process the payment untill you approvde thier booking.
tourmaster_general.admin-guest-booking-made-mail-title: A new booking has been made (Guest booked via email)
tourmaster_general.admin-guest-booking-made-mail: Dear Admin, A new booking form {customer-name} has been made. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {spaces} You can view the transaction here {spaces} Customer’s email : {customer-email} Please contact to your customer back for further details.
tourmaster_general.admin-payment-submitted-mail-title: A new payment receipt has been submitted
tourmaster_general.admin-payment-submitted-mail: Dear Admin, A new payment receipt has been submitted {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {spaces} You can view the transaction here
tourmaster_general.admin-online-payment-made-mail-title: A new booking has been made and successfully paid
tourmaster_general.admin-online-payment-made-mail: Dear Admin, A new booking has been made and sucessfully paid. {payment-method} {payment-date} {transaction-id} {spaces} {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {spaces} You can view the transaction here
tourmaster_general.admin-deposit-payment-made-mail-title: New deposit has been successfully paid
tourmaster_general.admin-deposit-payment-made-mail: Dear Admin, New deposit has been successfully paid. {payment-method} {submission-date} {transaction-id} {submission-amount} {spaces} {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {spaces} You can view the transaction here
tourmaster_general.booking-made-mail-title: Congratulations! Your account has been created
tourmaster_general.booking-made-approval-mail-title: You have made a new booking. Please wait for approval before processing payment
tourmaster_general.booking-made-approval-mail: Dear {customer-name}, You have made a booking on {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {total-price} Customer's Note: {customer-note} At this point, please do nothing yet. After admin approve your booking, you will get email notification and then you can process payment later.
tourmaster_general.booking-approve-mail-title: Your booking has been approved to process the payment
tourmaster_general.booking-approve-mail: Dear {customer-name}, You have made a booking on {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {total-price} Customer's Note: {customer-note} Admin has now approved your booking so you can process the payment. Please note that this is not the final approve until you finish the payment.
tourmaster_general.guest-booking-made-mail-title: You have made a new booking via email
tourmaster_general.guest-booking-made-mail: Dear {customer-name}, You have made a booking on {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {total-price} {divider} Our team will contact you back via the email you provided, {customer-email}
tourmaster_general.payment-made-mail-title: Your payment has been successfully processed
tourmaster_general.payment-made-mail: Dear {customer-name}, Congratulations! Your payment has been sucessfully processed. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {total-price} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {payment-method} {payment-date} {transaction-id} {spaces} You can view the receipt here
tourmaster_general.deposit-payment-made-mail-title: Your deposit has been successfully processed
tourmaster_general.deposit-payment-made-mail: Dear {customer-name}, Congratulations! Your deposit has been sucessfully processed. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date} {submission-amount} Customer's Note: {customer-note} {payment-method} {submission-date} {transaction-id} {spaces} You can view the receipt here
tourmaster_general.booking-cancelled-mail: Dear {customer-name}, We are here to inform that your booking has been cancelled. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date}
tourmaster_general.booking-reject-mail: Dear {customer-name}, We are sorry to inform that your booking has been rejected. Your booking was rejected because of your payment was not successfully processed or your booking might be in the pending status for too long. {tour-name} {order-number} {travel-date}
tourmaster_general.receipt-submission-mail: Dear {customer-name}, Thank you for payment submission. After reveiwing, we will get back to you soon. {tour-name} {order-number} {submission-date} {payment-method} {submission-amount} {transaction-id} Make a payment View Invoice {divider} If you wish to do the bank transfer. Please use the information below. Bank name: Center London Bank Account Number: 4455-4445-333 Swift Code: XXCCVV After transferring, please submit payment receipt from your dashboard. We'll get back to you when the submission verified.
tourmaster_general.receipt-approve-mail-title: Your payment submission has been approved.
tourmaster_general.receipt-approve-mail: Dear {customer-name}, Your payment submission has been approved. You can make another deposit or the final payment from your dashboard. {tour-name} {order-number} {submission-date} {payment-method} {submission-amount} {transaction-id} Make a payment View Invoice {divider} If you wish to do the bank transfer. Please use the information below. Bank name: Center London Bank Account Number: 4455-4445-333 Swift Code: XXCCVV After transferring, please submit payment receipt from your dashboard. We'll get back to you when the submission verified.
tourmaster_general.receipt-reject-mail-title: Your payment submission has been rejected.
tourmaster_general.receipt-reject-mail: Dear {customer-name}, Unfortunately, your payment submission is not valid. Please review your payment receipt and submit again. {tour-name} {order-number} {submission-date} {payment-method} {submission-amount} {transaction-id} Make a payment View Invoice {divider} If you wish to do the bank transfer. Please use the information below. Bank name: Center London Bank Account Number: 4455-4445-333 Swift Code: XXCCVV After transferring, please submit payment receipt from your dashboard. We'll get back to you when the submission verified.
